us.cost: $28.99/month for NBA League Pass, $69.99/month for Hulu + Live TV
us.restrictions: Some games may be blacked out locally. National broadcasts are exclusive to ABC, ESPN, and TNT.
us.additionalInfo: NBA League Pass offers both live and on-demand viewing. Local team games are typically blacked out on League Pass.

gb.cost: £24.99/month for Sky Sports, £14.99/month for NBA League Pass
gb.restrictions: No local blackouts, but some games may not be available live due to broadcasting rights
gb.additionalInfo: Sky Sports shows up to 5 live NBA games per week. NBA League Pass offers all games with no blackouts.

jp.cost: ¥2,990/month for NBA League Pass, ¥2,530/month for WOWOW
jp.additionalInfo: Rakuten has exclusive rights to NBA games in Japan. WOWOW offers some NBA content including playoffs.

ca.cost: CAD 29.99/month for NBA League Pass, CAD 19.99/month for TSN Direct
ca.restrictions: Local team games may be blacked out on League Pass
ca.additionalInfo: TSN and Sportsnet split national broadcast rights. RDS provides French-language coverage.

au.cost: AUD 39.99/month for NBA League Pass, AUD 25/month for Kayo Sports (includes ESPN)
au.additionalInfo: SBS broadcasts some games for free. ESPN shows select games through Foxtel and Kayo Sports.

fr.cost: €14.99/month for beIN Sports Connect, €19.99/month for NBA League Pass
fr.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds exclusive rights to NBA games in France.

de.cost: €29.99/month for DAZN, €19.99/month for NBA League Pass
de.additionalInfo: DAZN holds rights to NBA games in Germany.

es.cost: Varies for Movistar+, €19.99/month for NBA League Pass
es.additionalInfo: Movistar+ holds rights to NBA games in Spain.

it.cost: Varies for Sky Sport package, €19.99/month for NBA League Pass
it.additionalInfo: Sky Sport holds rights to NBA games in Italy.

br.cost: Varies for TV packages with ESPN, R$59.99/month for NBA League Pass
br.additionalInfo: ESPN Brasil broadcasts select NBA games.

in.cost: ₹299/month for SonyLIV, ₹1499/year for NBA League Pass
in.additionalInfo: Sony Six holds broadcast rights for NBA in India.

cn.cost: Varies for Tencent services, ¥198/month for NBA League Pass
cn.additionalInfo: Tencent is the exclusive digital partner of the NBA in China.

ph.cost: Varies for TV packages, ₱1,300/year for NBA League Pass
ph.additionalInfo: NBA TV Philippines is available through Cignal TV and other providers.
